text: Hi <@UQERM7BLY>, thanks for your response, I know the repeating group, but not never add it to field.json. Would you please share the document with me?
all field types can be found here:

Does anyone know what the 'size_type' paramaeter for the `img` arg of the `HubSpot/linked_image` default module does and what the potential options are? Can't find the documentation anywhere even though the CMS boilerplate includes it. `'size_type': 'auto_custom_max',`

hi! i have this pesky line of text that’s extending out of the blog area. how do I make this text fall in line with the rest of the text? (it’s a long string of text without spaces but I’d like it to still feed to the next line)
Hi Lauren can't really tell but going to guess that is a rich text module. I would go into the source code add an inline "style" to it " `word-break: break-all;`"
